name: ride-pager
effect: Allows the player to summon a Ride Pokémon.  Unused, as this can be done simply by pressing Y.
short_effect: Allows the player to summon a Ride Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
By entering certain numbers on this pager,
you can summon Ride Pokémon in an instant.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
By entering certain numbers on this pager,
you can summon Ride Pokémon in an instant.

By entering certain numbers on this pager,
you can summon Ride Pokémon in an instant.
